word_mean: 痉笑的：一种痉挛性或强直性露齿笑或不随意笑

sentence.Network_en: Occasionally he made a humorously sardonic remark.
sentence.Network_cn: 他时不时说一句幽默嘲讽的话。

sentence.Network_en: She gave him a sardonic smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 她朝他讥讽地笑了一笑.

sentence.Network_en: " I'm not being silly,'she replied with a sardonic laugh.
sentence.Network_cn: 她冷笑道: “ 我才不胡说呢.

list.abs: 谁笑在最... ... 媚笑 enchanting smile 狞笑 sardonic smile;to laugh maliciously 事业在先,享受在后 business before pleasure.
...oid facies）：表情淡漠，反应迟钝，呈无欲状态。见于肠伤寒、脑脊髓膜炎、脑炎等高热衰弱病人。11.苦笑面容（sardonic feature）：发作时牙关紧闭，面肌痉挛，呈苦笑状，见于破伤风。12.满月面容（moon facies）：面圆如满月，皮肤发红，呈多血质表现，常有痤疮，唇可有小须。.
公元前8世纪，古希腊诗人荷马在其著作中创造出“冷笑”(sardonic grin)一词，其中“sardonic”源于“撒丁岛”(Sardinia)，指撒丁岛上通过 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French sardonique, earlier sardonien, via Latin from Greek sardonios 'of Sardinia', alteration of sardanios, used by Homer to describe bitter or scornful laughter

entry.def: If you describe someone as sardonic, you mean their attitude to people or things is humorous but rather critical.

example.ex: ...a big, sardonic man, who intimidated his students.
example.tran: 令学生胆怯的身材魁梧、爱嘲讽人的男人

means.word_mean: 1. disdainfully or ironically humorous; scornful and mocking;

sentences.sentence: "his rebellion is the bitter, sardonic laughter of all great satirists"- Frank Schoenberner
"a wry pleasure to be...reminded of all that one is missing"- Irwin Edman
